categories: Category:Choose Your Own Star Wars Adventure

nodes.text: The Lost Jedi is a series of "choose your own adventure" style books published from 1993 to 1995. Written by Paul Cockburn and published by Boxtree Ltd, the books were only available in the United Kingdom. The series included two books, Jedi Dawn and The Bounty Hunter, which were both later collected in The Lost Jedi Adventure Game Book.[source?]
